change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 441/2003, effective December 8, 2003.

section.sectiontext: The standards for the purposes of sections 37 and 37.1 of the Manufactured Home Act are sections 71 and 72 of Part 1 (16th Edition) of C22.1-1990 Canadian Electrical Code of the Canadian Standards Association, and

paragraph.paragraphtext: the following portions of CAN/CSA Z240, MH Series-M86, Mobile Homes

subparagraph.subparagraphtext: CAN/CSA Z240.0.1-M86, Definitions and General Requirements for Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.1.1-M86, Vehicular Requirements for Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.2.1-M86, Structural Requirements for Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.3.1-M86, Plumbing Requirements for Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.4.1-M86, Installations Requirements for Gas Burning Appliances in Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.5.1-M86, Oil Installation Requirements for Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.8.1-M86, Windows for Use in Mobile Homes,
CAN/CSA Z240.9.1-M86, Requirements for Load Calculations and Duct Design for Heating and Cooling of Mobile Homes, or

paragraph.paragraphtext: CAN/CSA A277-90, Procedure for Certification of Factory Built Houses.
